nodes.text: Rarrook  was a male Wookiee living during the Galactic War. At some point he became part of the Order of Revan and joined with the Revanite forces on Rishi. During the Battle of Rishi in 3637 BBY he and a fellow Revanite Marko Ka tried to stop a strike team from reaching the signal jammer on the Razorback Island, but failed and were killed.
Rarrook appears in the Star Wars: The Old Republic: Shadow of Revan expansion, released on December 2, 2014.
